titleStmt.title: A Briefe request or declaracion presented vnto madame the Duchesse of Parme &c. regente of the Lowe Countrie of Flaunders, by the lordes and nobilitie of the same countrie with the answere and replie, and other writynges / Englished by W.F.
titleStmt.author: Margaret, of Austria, Duchess of Parma, 1522-1586.
Philip II, King of Spain, 1527-1598.
W. F.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Ihon Kyngston, for Thomas Humble, dwellyng at the signe of the George in Lumberdstreate,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Lambeth Palace Library.
